Isaiah or Isaias__21.1__The desert of the sea: : So Babylon is here called, because from a city as full of people as the sea is with water, it was become a desert.
Isaiah or Isaias__21.7__A rider upon an ass: : These two riders are the kings of the Persians and Medes.
Isaiah or Isaias__21.8__And a lion cried out: : That is, I Isaias seeing the approaching ruin of Babylon, have cried out as a lion roaring.
